{"id":933177063,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1681404613,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2230 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/933177063/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"303.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        set<vector<int>> uniqueTriplets;\n        vector<vector<int>> triplets;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){\n            //vector<int> triplet;\n            int j=i+1,k=nums.size()-1,tripletSum;\n            while(j<k){\n                tripletSum=nums[i]+nums[j]+nums[k];\n                if(tripletSum==0)\n                uniqueTriplets.insert({nums[i],nums[j],nums[k]});\n                if(tripletSum<0)\n                j++;\n                else\n                k--;                \n            }\n        }\n        for(auto it:uniqueTriplets)\n        triplets.push_back(it);\n        return(triplets);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
